bibl.title: Occasional Archaeological Discoveries Reported to the Graeco-Roman Museum in 1941-1942.
bibl.note: 1. Roman tomb at Mafruza. - 2. Fish-pond and leonine table-leg at Gabbary. - 3. Gabbary tomb. - 4. Funerary monument at Mustafa Pacha. - 5. Jar burials at Bulkeley. - 6. Roman cimetery at Nuzha. - 7. Gabbary tomb No. 2.
bibl.seg: Habachi Banoub, Occasional Archaeological Discoveries Reported to the Graeco-Roman Museum in 1941-1942.

1. Roman tomb at Mafruza. - 2. Fish-pond and leonine table-leg at Gabbary. - 3. Gabbary tomb. - 4. Funerary monument at Mustafa Pacha. - 5. Jar burials at Bulkeley. - 6. Roman cimetery at Nuzha. - 7. Gabbary tomb No. 2.
